comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Gadsden County's harvest of gold, shade tobacco, is being set as weather clears and sun shines warmly. Some 43 acres on the C.W. Harbin farm are getting the plants beneath the shade this week. Priming, harvesting leaves from the plants, is expected to start in seven weeks, and continue until late June."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 73143817@N00
comment._content: Looking forward to more images of #africanamericans as Entrepreneurs, Professionals, etc.
